pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Association Between Regionalizations // Calculates a degree of spatial association between regionalizations or categorical maps using the information-theoretical V-measure (Nowosad and Stepinski (2018) doi:10.1080/13658816.2018.1511794). It also offers an R implementation of the MapCurve method (Hargrove et al. (2006) doi:10.1007/s10109-006-0025-x).
